pageContext.description: A. seems to be complete and is well preserved, but the point is missing from B. They are round in section except where the eye is + here they are oval.
pageContext.patina: A. A matte light green patina; B. light green patina
pageContext.surface: A. smooth with traces of encrustment. B. smooth + slightly encrusted.
pageContext.associations: There are 11 others, much about the same size of the larger one, although some are broken about half way + nearly all have broken eyes (they measure from 73 to 121).
pageContext.collection: Private Collection,Late Lord Amherst of Hackney, FSA,Sotheby's 17.vi.21, Lot 827
pageContext.toSearch: Amarna, Tall Bani Omran, Deir Mawas, Menia Governorate, Egypt
